about_the_game:
PLEASE NOTE: The WORLD END ECONOMiCA - Official Guidebook contains spoilers for the entire WORLD END ECONOMiCA trilogy. It is recommended to finish playing all three games before reading.

The WORLD END ECONOMiCA - Official Guidebook is detailed, 144 page book which covers each of the three WORLD END ECONOMiCA games. For fans of the series that want to learn more about Hal, Hagana and their friends this book has it all. Detailed pages including rough designs and commentary on each character in the series. See preproduction sketches of the various backgrounds and places that make up the WORLD END ECONOMiCA universe.

Also included are detailed interviews with creator Isuna Hasekura, opening theme composer Kishida Kyoudan and THE Akeboshi Rockets as well as the staff that worked on the trilogy. Also includes a column by Isuna Hasekura on the 2008 financial crisis and the bankruptcy of Lehman Brothers and how this relates to WORLD END ECONOMiCA. For those that want to know more about various financial terms discussed in the trilogy, there is also a handy glossary of terms to reference.

English Digital Edition Bonus: Also includes WORLD END ECONOMiCA -side story-, a short story featuring Chris and Eleanor from WORLD END ECONOMiCA episode.02!
